verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu dvāra karāila mocana
ānande āsiyā loka pāila daraśana

synonyms: tabe—thereupon; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dvāra—the door; karāila—made; mocana—opening; ānande—in great pleasure; āsiyā—coming; loka—all the people; pāila—got; daraśana—sight.
translation: After lunch, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu made them open the door. In this way everyone received His audience with great pleasure.
